name: Castle Siege (itch) (WesMcW, Leah)
description:
In Castle Siege, your goal is to buy units to lay siege on the enemy castle. Units move by themselves along the board and have a unique condition that makes them evolve and become more powerful. If a unit reaches the other end of the board, they will damage that castle. If either castle's health hits 0, the other player wins!

Controls: 
Units can be bought by clicking and dragging them to one of 5 starting points on the grid. 
There are no other controls; units and the enemy tower play by themselves!

This game was made during a 48-hour Game Jam with the theme of 'Evolve'
by Leah Blasczyk and Wesley McWhorter
Music was created by Alyssa Fuller
Unit sprites were created by Brady Purtell
3D Low Poly asset pack from Emerald Eel Entertainment
https://emerald-eel-entertainment.itch.io/low-poly-foliage-pack-001
